colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @018A *, ,(ZHES DGE MTSAN PHYVA GA-YANG SPEL BA'I CHO GA BYA TSUL DUS NGAN 'TSO BA'I LAG CHA ZHES BYA BA 'DI @018B YANG, ^RGYAL KHAMS SMYUL BA'I SPRANG CHUNG DGE SBYONG BA RATNA KIRTIS RANG GI KUN RTOG LA SHAR BA LTAR RI MOR SPEL BA'I YI GE PA NI, RNAM DPYOD DANG LDAN PA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN GYIS BGYIS PAS DGE MTSAN 'PHEL BAR GYUR CIG ,BKRA SHIS 'BAR GYUR CIG ,DGE'O, ,) RNAM DPYOD DAD LDAN BLA MA SKYABS CES PAS, ,RNAM MANG MKHAS 'BYUNG DGA' LDAN BSHAD BSGRUB DER, ,RNAM KUN DON LDAN NGO MTSAR CHO GA 'DI, ,RNAM PAR DAG PA'I BSAM PAS SBAR DU SKRUN, ,RNAM DKAR JI SNYED BSAGS PA DES, ,RNAM MANG MAR GYUR 'GRO BA RNAMS, ,RNAM PA KUN TU BDE @019A *, ,LDAN ZHING, ,RNAM KUN MKHYEN PA'I SA THOB SHOG ,GNAS SKABS SU YANG NYE 'BREL BCAS, ,GNAS MAL ZAS GOS NOR RDZAS SOGS, ,GNAS RKYEN PHUN SUM TSOGS PA YIS, ,GNAS TE YUN RING BDER GYUR CIG ,(CES PA BSTAN 'DZIN GYI 'DOD MOS LTAR DKA' MING CAN ZHIG GIS BGYIS SO, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
